item.description:
Hi Everyone,

This is sort of short notice, but I wanted to see if anyone is interested in joining a few of us to catch the Habs v Bruins game at the Greatest bar near the Gardens. This promises to be a supreme grudge match, with both teams very close in the standings, and if there wasn't enough bad blood before, we have the Chara incident. So if you don't have tickets, and were planning to watch the game, come on down and give a canadian team some support, or if you must, support the other guys.

 

Give me a call if you don't see me there. 857-221-2041

Go Habs!

Bruce

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Habs v Bruins!
